long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Custom Linker is a powerful browser extension that allows you to create custom context menu items for quickly generating URLs or performing searches based on selected text. It's perfect for researchers, developers, or anyone who frequently needs to look up information online.

With this extension, you can create custom shortcuts that appear in the right-click context menu. These shortcuts can be used to search specific websites, append selected text to a URL, or replace placeholders in predefined URL patterns.
